Initializes a new instance of the error message with a default message indicating that the provided deferred action nonce is invalid.

<Note>
  `InvalidDeferredActionNonceError` extends `BaseError`, see the docs for
  BaseError for all supported methods.
</Note>

## Import

```ts
import { InvalidDeferredActionNonceError } from "@alchemy/smart-accounts";
```
